dct_title_s: Totius Neobelgii nova et accuratissima tabula
dct_description_sm: Shows New England, parts of Middle Atlantic States and part of Virginia. Relief shown pictorially. Depths shown by soundings. Hand colored. Title in illustrative cartouche. Includes ill. and view of "Nieuw-Amsterdam onlangs Nieuw Jorck genaemt" with its key. A later issue of the map originally published by Hugo Allard. Cf. "New light on the Jansson-Visscher maps of New England" / T. Campbell. Map collector's circle, no. 24, 1965. Date of publication from Burden.
